events.message: I recently received the laptop I ordered, but the screen has a large scratch on it which makes it hard to use.
The reported problem with the scratched screen has been categorized under product defect for resolution purposes.
Your case has been assigned to a support specialist who will assist you with the screen defect issue.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the scratch on your laptop screen. I'll do my best to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched area as well as your order number so we can verify the issue?
I have attached several pictures of the scratch and my order ID is 789456123. The damage was there when I unboxed the laptop.
Thank you for the photos and details. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, as I really like this model and want to continue using it without defects.
We have processed your replacement request and arranged for a new laptop to be shipped to your address within 3 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your replacement laptop and that everything is satisfactory now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for your quick support!
We are glad to hear the replacement laptop meets your expectations. We are closing your case now, feel free to contact us anytime.
